profile.name: David Tolnay
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Rust Compiler Development & Systems Programming
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a strong focus on systems programming and compiler development. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects, including the Rust compiler.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at 0xF9BA143B95FF6D82
description: Designed and implemented several key features for the Rust compiler, including improved error handling and performance optimizations.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and maintain the Rust language specification.
Developed and maintained various crates, including `typeid` and `threadbound`, showcasing expertise in systems programming.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects, including the Rust compiler's `target-triple` crate.
Provided expert advice to clients on systems programming and compiler development best practices.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the Rust compiler's development, including bug fixes and feature enhancements.
Participated in community discussions and helped shape the language's direction.
